title: Anthony Davis ranked third on SI's list of top 100 NBA players
content: Anthony Davis finished fifth in MVP voting last season, but there are plenty of folks out there who would argue that he's already the league's third best player, despite playing just three NBA seasons. Sports Illustrated validated that opinion by ranking Davis third in the publication's list of the top 100 NBA players. Davis finished ahead of reigning MVP Stephen Curry on this list, and if he continues to develop as expected, he could very well top it in the very near future.
